local plains = CountCardsSubtypeZonePlayer( LAND_TYPE_PLAINS, ZONE_IN_PLAY, EffectController() ) local islands = CountCardsSubtypeZonePlayer( LAND_TYPE_ISLAND, ZONE_IN_PLAY, EffectController() )
